meanings.definition: To search for or collect items washed up on the shore of a beach.
meanings.sent1: She beachcombed for seashells every morning.
meanings.sent2: The children beachcombed for treasures after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The beachcombed seagull found a shiny coin in the sand.
meanings.sent4: He beachcombed the shore like a detective searching for clues.
meanings.sent5: The old man beachcombed with a keen eye, finding hidden gems in the sand.

meanings.definition: The act of walking along a beach to search for or collect items.
meanings.sent1: Beachcombing is a relaxing way to spend a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent2: During the vacation, they enjoyed morning beachcombing sessions.
meanings.sent3: The beachcombed group of friends always found interesting things by the shore.
meanings.sent4: The beachcombed tour along the coast was filled with exciting discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The beachcombed event attracted many nature enthusiasts eager to explore the beach.
